comment._content: "Charles Michael Schwab (February 18, 1862 – October 18, 1939) was an American steel magnate. Under his leadership, Bethlehem Steel became the second largest steel maker in the United States, and one of the most important heavy manufacturers in the world." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_M._Schwab
